entry.title: ByeTools is getting Undertale support (and I guess this is the first time I've ever mentioned it)!

link.title: ByeTools is getting Undertale support (and I guess this is the first time I've ever mentioned it)!

entry.summary:
So, recently I decieded to start playing Undertale, and after about two hours(!) I decided to change up my save game. Unfortunatly, Annoying Dog had other ideas.
So, what about stopping this? There is a tool called UndertaleSandbox that can do this, but I find it restrictive and hard to use. How about rephrasing the question to “So, what can I do about stopping this?”
I’ll keep you updated....

entry.title: How I Got This To Work

link.title: How I Got This To Work

entry.summary:
Hello, and welcome to my brand-new, revamped website! Using GitHub Pages, I’ve been hosting a small website for the last few months. However, I’ve been wanting to start a blog. For this, I’m going to use Jekyll. Jekyll lets you make dynamic websites. It’s mainly used as a blogging tool, and Pages has internal support for it.
This site uses a theme called Chirpy, but GitHub Pages does not have ...
